availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert A. Pinkerton (Morgan County, OH, cabinetmaker )

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, cabinetmaker. Pennsylvania native. Married to Lydia A. Pinkerton. Father of Lydia A. Pinkerton Grimes. Cabinetmaker in Morgan County, Ohio, in 1850. Employed Sheldon Nott as a cabinetmaker in Morgan County in 1850. Cabinetmaker in McConnelsville in 1860. Employed Mary Kilkenny as a domestic servant and Thomas Kilkenny as an apprentice in McConnelsville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Morgan, p. 236A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, McConnelsville, p. 295.
"Robert Adams Pinkerton (1805-1891)," Find A Grave, Memorial #6677225, accessed August 26, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6677225.
